title: Rich beef pie with parsnip crust
ingredients: ['6 potatoes, peeled and chopped', '4 parsnips, peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, peeled and chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and chopped', '750g minced beef', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon flour', '1 tin Heinz Oxtail Soup', '200g frozen petit pois', '150ml milk', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '3 tablespoons grated cheese']
